omission.description: None; both the starting and ending tags are mandatory.

parents.description: Any element that accepts flow content (WHATWG). However, the W3C specification doesn't permit <main> to be used as a descendant ofÂ  <article>, <aside>, <footer>, <header>, or <nav>.

roles: The main role is applied to <main> by default
and the presentation role is permitted as well.
